summary: The Sinaloa Cartel is a powerful Mexican criminal group that mainly deals with illegal drug trafficking and money laundering. It started in the late 1960s as a small marijuana smuggling operation but grew into one of the world's most dangerous drug organizations. Over time, they expanded their business to include other drugs like cocaine and heroin, and they became known for their violent methods. Despite many arrests, the cartel continues to operate in Mexico and other countries, making it a major player in the global drug trade.
title: Sinaloa Cartel
